    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public SKClient connect(java.lang.String address,
                        int port)
                 throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Connects to a server with the specified address and port. The communication listener thread is also started.
        Parameters:
        address - - the host address to connect to
        port - - the active server port of the host
        Returns:
        this client instance
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if the IP address of the host could not be determined
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when creating the socket
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the port parameter is outside the specified range of valid port values, which is between 0 and 65535, inclusive
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if there are no packet listeners associated with this client

      • disconnect

        public SKClient disconnect(java.lang.String msg)
        Disconnects this client from the server host.

        Sends a message to the server host indicating the disconnection. Then, calls close(boolean, String).

        Parameters:
        msg - - the message to send to the server host
        Returns:
        this client instance

      • send

        public boolean send(SKPacket packet)
        Sends a packet to the server host. Returns true if the packet was successfully delivered.
        Parameters:
        packet - - the packet to send
        Returns:
        true if the packet was delivered successfully

      • close

        protected SKClient close(boolean local,
                         java.lang.String msg)
        Closes the connection to the server host.

        Calls SKPacketListener.disconnected(SKConnection, boolean, String) for each active packet listener of this client. Then, closes the connection by calling SKConnection.close().

        Parameters:
        local - - true if the the disconnection was fired locally
        msg - - the message associated with this disconnection
        Returns:
        this client instance

      • addPacketListener

        public SKClient addPacketListener(SKPacketListener packetListener)
        Adds a packet listener to this client.
        Parameters:
        packetListener - - the packet listener to add
        Returns:
        this client instance

      • getPacketListeners

        public java.util.ArrayList<SKPacketListener> getPacketListeners()
        Returns an array list containing all packet listeners associated with this client.
        Returns:
        an array list containing all packet listeners

      • getConnection

        public SKConnection getConnection()
        Returns the connection of this client or null if no connection has been established.
        Returns:
        the connection of this client
